alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 2:56PM EST until January 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snowfall totals will be south of I-90 and east of I- 79. The snow will persist through the evening hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
